description: Detects modification of the registry settings used for Internet Explorer and other Windows components that use these settings. An attacker can abuse this registry key to add a domain to the trusted sites Zone or insert javascript for persistence
author: frack113
name: Modification of IE Registry Settings
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Internet\ Settings*) AND (NOT (((winlog.event_data.Details:DWORD*)) OR ((winlog.event_data.Details:("Cookie:" OR "Visited:" OR "(Empty)"))) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Cache* OR *\\ZoneMap* OR *\\WpadDecision*))) OR ((winlog.event_data.Details:"Binary Data")) OR ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Accepted\ Documents\\*)))))
